data.selection_rationale: M1 (Naive Forecast) was selected as it achieved the lowest average MAE of 71.95, significantly outperforming M3 (75.17 MAE) and M2 (187.04 MAE).
data.method_comparison_summary: M1: 71.95 MAE (baseline), M3: 75.17 MAE (+4.5% over M1), M2: 187.04 MAE (+160.0% over M1).
data.winning_method_code:
def predict_naive(train_df, test_df, target_col, **params):
    import pandas as pd
    # Get last available year column before target
    year_cols = [c for c in train_df.columns if c.startswith('Area-') and c != target_col]
    last_year = sorted(year_cols)[-1]
    predictions = train_df[last_year].values
    return pd.DataFrame({'predicted': predictions}, index=test_df.index)
